installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt-get update
apt-get install -y git curl wget jq file tar unzip zip openssl
mkdir -p /mnt/server/ # Not required. Only here for parkervcp's local test setup
cd /mnt/server || exit 1
UPGRADE="no"
if [ -d "./java" ]; then
UPGRADE="yes"
fi
wget https://github.com/PowerNukkitX/PNX-CLI/releases/download/0.1.6/PNX-CLI-Linux-x86.zip -O pnx.zip
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerNukkitX/PowerNukkitX/master/src/main/resources/default-nukkit.yml -O nukkit.yml
unzip pnx.zip
rm -fr pnx.zip 2>&1 >/dev/null
mv ./target/linux-x86/pnx ./ 2>&1 >/dev/null
rm -fr target 2>&1 >/dev/null
rm -fr java 2>&1 >/dev/null
chmod +x pnx
./pnx jvm install=GraalVM
if [ "$UPGRADE" == "no" ]; then
if [ "$VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
./pnx server install --latest
else
./pnx server install --dev
fi
else
rm -fr libs 2>&1 >/dev/null
if [ "$VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
./pnx server update --latest
else
./pnx server update --dev
fi
fi
rm -fr tmp-GraalVM.tar.gz 2>&1 >/dev/null
cat <<EOF
----------------------------------------
| |
| PowerNukkitX Installation Done |
| |
----------------------------------------
EOF
